long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track Personal or Employee productivity, manage projects, monitor daily tasks, track billable hours, reporting, 100% FREE! No nag screen or ads!

Whether you are you a business of 1 or 100 or simply just need some personal accountability to stay focused on every day tasks, you are going to find Task Timer Pro an invaluable plugin to your Google Chrome experience.  

- Track employees actions
- Track your actions
- Track how long it took for each task

What's new in Version 2.0?
- Create customized headers and titles perfect for client accountability reporting and hourly invoicing.
- Edit nearly everything, modify the time and date stamps.
- Rearrange the order of task reporting
- Print Reports
- Fax Reports
- Save Reports As
- Save Report to History Archives within the program which allows you to reopen and continue or edit in the future if desired
- Create Custom Graph Pie Charts
- Clear History Files in a one touch command
- Set when and if you want the timer to reset whether it be every night at midnight or allow it to run 24/7 without interruption
- Training Videos
- Help Site
- Real Customer Support ready to help

Are you just self-motivated and can use a little self-accountability to see where you spent the majority of your day whether to provide a detailed time and date stamped report to your client or just for your own review to see where time could be better managed?  Do you own a service where you charge by the hour for your time and need to record specific accounting for your billable time?  Do you want to control that one thing we all get caught up in of becoming side tracked and sucked down the portal of the internet when we really should be better focused on the task at hand?  

Task Timer Pro 2.0 for Chrome takes care of all these needs and more and it's "still 100% FREE with no time restrictions".  I simply needed a better task and productivity timer for my company, couldn't find one like I needed so created one.  I could probably sell it but helping others is what we do best at PMUSA (a Project Management Firm) so I decided when I first uploaded version 1 of this program to simply share with others the program for free.  

Task Timer Pro also always remains in your browser bar for fast access, no full program to turn on and off, and isn’t over loaded with other features which really aren’t needed.  It was designed to be slick and to the point, fast to use because time is precious and if managed properly, you’ll greatly increase your productivity or even better your financial earnings!  

Task Timer Pro is truly 100% FREE and has no nag-screens, advertising or anything else to eat up your time unlike many other programs available.  It was built for one thing only - Save Time and allow those who use it to be more productive and accountable to their daily tasks.

Simply install and ENJOY!

Created by Michael D Baker
Project Management USA
